item.title: [+1372] Video of Rep. Bob Etheridge (D-NC) assaulting a student.
item.description: Rep. Bob Etheridge (D-NC) attacks a student after being asked a question about his support for President Obama's political agenda.

item.title: [+1289] World Champion Free Diver Free Falls Into Blue Hole [Video]
item.description: World famous French free-diver Guillaume Nery free-dives Dean’s Blue Hole in the Bahamas (the World’s second deepest blue hole which plunges 202 meters/663 ft to the ocean floor) to make a short movie that emphasizes aesthetic images and innovative camera moves.

item.title: [+1227] The Most Dangerous Animal Around [Pic]

item.description: Indulgent parenting is spawning a new generation of entitled hipster brats.....

item.title: [+1062] xkcd: Southern Half
[+996] BP-hired security blocks media access to workers
item.description: BP CEO Doug Suttles issued a letter saying, "Reports have suggested that individuals involved in the cleanup have been prohibited from speaking to the media, and this is simply untrue. BP fully supports and defends all individuals rights to share their personal thoughts and experiences with journalists." Yet this video tells a different story...

item.title: [+986] Cliffs of Moher [Pic]
[+901] Soccer and Oil Spills (PIC)
[+816] Israeli Soldier Murdering Peace Activist on Freedom Flotilla
item.description: This new smuggled video, showing IDF commandos brutally kicking their 19-year-old American captive, who is clearly posing no threat to them, and then firing four shots downward into him. The autopsy showed he was shot four times in the face, and at least once in the back.

item.title: [+690] A Horrifying Look at Animal Abuse Inside a Dairy Farm
item.description: Be warned: this video is not for the faint of heart, especially if you’re an animal lover. The footage comes from Conklin Dairy Farms in Ohio, where hidden cameras caught workers cruelly and mercilessly abusing cows and calves.

item.title: [+677] Should the vuvuzela be banned at the World Cup?
item.description: The long plastic trumpets have been blowing in all the matches so far at the tournament. Their sound is ubiquitous.

item.title: [+641] IPhone 4’s Crystal Clear Retina Display [VIDEO]
item.description: Last week, Steve Jobs unveiled the forthcoming iPhone 4 at Apple’s Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC). Among the most praised features of the new smartphone is its new “retina display,” but how good does the iPhone 4’s screen really look?

item.title: [+636] U.S. Discovers Vast Riches of Minerals in Afghanistan
item.description: The nearly $1 trillion in untapped deposits are enough to fundamentally alter the Afghan economy and perhaps the Afghan war itself, officials said.

item.title: [+633] 10 of the best free games you should play today

item.title: [+556] Guile Theme Goes With Everything (VID)
item.description: Some things just need a little Street Fighter II Guile theme music to bring them to the next level. What else but Guile's theme music could make this video even better? Endless celebration and laughter to ensue...
